name: Co-sign @ MeltingFields01 | 2021.8.8
description:
This piece is signed by 87 individuals who gathered at an event known as Melting Fields 01, at a place called DREEEM Lab, in Hong Kong, on 2021.8.8.

The generative art work is made of precisely these signature proves of their presence: there, then.

The union of these precise individuals at that particular place and time creates an occurrence that would practically only ever happen once in the lifetime of the universe. This work is a celebration for this cosmic fortune.

Let this energy build up, may the ring expands!

–Jun Rivers 2021.9
